title: [BUG] Rune pages are not editable or visible in champion select
body:
There is a bug where on occasion, clicking the edit rune page button in champion select will produce the popup but only the outlining container and close button is shown. Nothing related to runes can be seen and the only action that can be taken is clicking the close button.  In the last 4 days this has happened ~8 times and reinstalling/repairing does not fix the issue (I have repaired 3 times already). When in champion selection other players have also posted in the chat that their rune pages also won't show up - I don't think this is an isolated issues. This has only ever occurred in ARAM.

Also note that the summary of the rune pages shown when hovering each individual page, does not show what the rune page actually contains (e.g. summary says Aftershock but when I get in game I have Grasp of the Undying).

replies.body:
This is a known issue with the pre-season client. There is a reason they do all the big changes in pre-season, and this is one of the unfortunate side-effects.

Some people have reported that a client repair and/or re-install has resolved this particular issue, so that's what I would recommend in your case. Failing that, player support may be able to offer you some other workarounds and/or an ETA on the full fix: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Just happened to me and not for the first time. On top of this after every few games client becomes so laggy it needs to be restarted, cant invite some people to my lobby because it says they are creating a ranked gamed in BLUE and says they are in-game even in post game lobby.

It's been like this for atleast 2 months please sort this shit out. It's fucking aids.
